entries.name: Psych::Emitter.new(io, options = Psych::Emitter::OPTIONS)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Create a new Psych::Emitter that writes to io.

entries.name: canonicalclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Get the output style, canonical or not.

entries.name: canonical = trueclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Set the output style to canonical, or not.

entries.name: end_document(implicit)click to toggle source
entries.desc: End a document emission with an implicit ending.

entries.name: end_mappingclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Emit the end of a mapping.

entries.name: indentation = levelclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Set the indentation level to level.  The level must be less than 10 and greater than 1.

entries.name: line_width = widthclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Set the preferred line with to width.

entries.name: scalar(value, anchor, tag, plain, quoted, style)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Emit a scalar with value, anchor, tag, and a plain or quoted string type with style.

entries.name: start_document(version, tags, implicit)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Start a document emission with YAML version, tags, and an implicit start.

entries.name: start_mapping(anchor, tag, implicit, style)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Start emitting a YAML map with anchor, tag, an implicit start and end, and style.

entries.name: start_sequence(anchor, tag, implicit, style)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Start emitting a sequence with anchor, a tag, implicit sequence start and end, along with style.

entries.name: start_stream(encoding)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Start a stream emission with encoding
